lead_paragraph: Mike Napoli cherishes his time playing in Boston, ripping line drives off the Green Monster, spraying champagne in Fenway Park and being part of so many unforgettable moments.

headline.print_headline: Napoli's Clutch Homer Lifts Indians Past Ortiz, Red Sox 7-6
headline.main: Napoli's Clutch Homer Lifts Indians Past Ortiz, Red Sox 7-6

snippet: Mike Napoli cherishes his time playing in Boston, ripping line drives off the Green Monster, spraying champagne in Fenway Park and being part of so many unforgettable moments....
